title: Classic Full Sleeve Blouse
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a women's blouse with full-length sleeves, tailored fit, soft drape, solid dusty rose color, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and button cuffs, plain white background, no model or mannequin
techpack: Women's blouse with full-length sleeves, tailored silhouette, crew neckline, hip length, regular fit. Constructed in lightweight cotton poplin with silk blend for softness. Features mother-of-pearl buttons on front placket and cuffs, double topstitching for durability. Recommended seam allowance 1cm, sleeve length 60cm from shoulder point.
provenance: Inspired by commercial full sleeve trend in contemporary womenswear.
design_text:
Classic Full Sleeve Blouse (FS001)
Colors: Dusty Rose, Soft Beige, Ivory White
Fabrics: Lightweight Cotton Poplin, Silk Blend
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: Blouse
Silhouette: Tailored
Sleeves: Full sleeves with buttoned cuffs
Neckline: Crew neck
Length: Hip length
Style / Fit: R, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: Mother-of-pearl buttons, Double topstitching, Buttoned cuffs
